segments.text: I see a typical kitchen scene at first glance, but something is very wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely overflowing, water streaming down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a wide puddle on the floor, getting bigger by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman standing there is completely unaware of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate, her gaze fixed on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly oblivious to their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a mess, really, and it's only getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the water damage to the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be in her own world, completely detached from the physical reality.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The continuous sheet of water is mesmerizing in its destructive flow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn her, but I'm merely an observer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is truly baffling to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a slow-motion disaster unfolding before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR
